meanings.sent1: I have a shitload of homework to do tonight.
meanings.sent2: She bought a shitload of groceries at the store.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought a shitload of candy, now I have to eat it all!
meanings.sent4: The team had a shitload of energy during the game.
meanings.sent5: The teacher gave us a shitload of homework over the weekend.

meanings.definition: To load or fill with a large amount.
meanings.sent1: I need to shitload the truck with boxes before we leave.
meanings.sent2: They decided to shitload the car with camping gear for the trip.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally shitload the washing machine with too many clothes.
meanings.sent4: The workers had to shitload the shelves with new products.
meanings.sent5: She asked me to shitload the boxes onto the conveyor belt.
